name: Survive the Night (itch) (JDHST6)
description:
Survive the Night

DESCRIPTION:

You take the role of a survivor who is set on surviving a horde of zombies. With multiple waves of zombies coming, are you up to the task to survive the night, and escape the warehouse with your life?

CONTROLS:

You are able to control your character either using WASD controls or the Arrow controls on a keyboard. You can also shoot your gun using your mouse and clicking the left mouse button. 
A new addition here is the ability to pause the game when pressing the ESC key on your keyboard.

CREDITS:
Character + Assets
